For the history of the samurai, Turnbull has many titles, Samurai a Military History is my favorite.
For fiction I would recomend Taiko and Musashi, both by Eiji Yoshikawa.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: BMCAMP@... 
  To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, January 14, 2004 9:44 AM
  Subject: [samuraihistory] Books to Read?


  I would like to know if someone can recommend some good books about Samurai 
  history.  The only thing is they have to be in English.  I am currently reading 
  Legends of  the Samurai and have several books about Bushido on order by 
  Yamamoto Tsunetomo.  Any help would be greatly appreciated, also if there are any 
  good fiction books to read about Samurai, I would be interested in those also.

  Thanks,

  Brett
